trans-unit.target: Retorna dados a partir de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> event is raised by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> class.
StateChangedEventArgs derives from <xref:System.EventArgs> and is passed to handlers for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: StateChangedEventArgs deriva <xref:System.EventArgs>e são passados para manipuladores para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A shared speech recognizer's state cannot be changed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Estado do reconhecedor de fala compartilhado não pode ser alterado por meio de programação.

trans-unit.source: Users can change a shared speech recognizer's state using the Speech Recognition user interface (UI) or through the **Speech Recognition** member of the Windows **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Os usuários podem alterar o estado do reconhecedor de fala compartilhada usando a interface de usuário de reconhecimento de fala (UI) ou por meio de **o reconhecimento de fala** membro do Windows **painel de controle**.

trans-unit.source: Both the **On** and **Sleep** settings in the Speech Recognition UI correspond to the `Listening` state.
trans-unit.target: Ambos o **na** e **suspensão** configurações na interface de usuário de reconhecimento de fala correspondem ao `Listening` estado.

trans-unit.source: The **Off** setting in the Speech Recognition UI corresponds to <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>.
trans-unit.target: O **Off** configuração na interface de usuário de reconhecimento de fala corresponde à <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the shared speech recognition engine in Windows.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala compartilhada no Windows.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState"></xref> instance that indicates whether the state of a shared speech recognition engine is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Listening" name="Listening" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Stopped" name="Stopped" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState"> </xref> instância que indica se o estado de um mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala compartilhado é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Listening" name="Listening" href=""> </xref> ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_Stopped" name="Stopped" href=""> </xref>.
